description:
Putting together a presentation without the right template is like starting the day without coffee: you can do it, but why would you? Building a stunning powerpoint template is not hard, but very few people know how to do it. Armed with a beautifully designed template, you'll:

  • Communicate more effectively
  • Save time on pesky formatting
  • Blow everybody away with your design sensibilities

This course will teach you how to

  1. Adjust the size of your slides
  2. Set the color scheme
  3. Create master design elements
  4. Adjust custom page numbers
  5. Set default shapes
  6. Build template slides
  7. Upload custom iconography (Pro Tip!)
  8. Import custom fonts (Pro Tip!)
  9. And apply finishing touches

Whether you're creating an internal presentation for work, building a pitch deck for your big idea, or just creating something beautiful to share with your friends and family, this course will help you look your best in no time flat.

Over these nine concise lessons, we'll go from an ugly blank default template to the template that was used in for the introduction video. Follow along and you'll end up with the exact same template you can use for your own purposes. Or go out and customize your own.
title: How To Design Gorgeous Powerpoint Templates | PPT Hackers
